about_the_game:
"Who am I, what am I? I'm a robot, right? Anyway, I've got a couple of Objectives I don't have time for right now."

- You'll be asking this all game, Abyssal Reflections is short Atmospheric depressing "non-jumpscare" game where you go through a total of 8 different time periods. You'll have to take care of your owners and how you relate to them is up to you.

Key elements:
  • Interaction with every character in the game.
  • Dark and isolated atmosphere.
  • Interacting with the environment, such as cleaning or clearing up messes.
  • Fully controllable in-game OS home charger, with bags and information, allowing you to end your work shift.
  • Thirty-minute gameplay featuring a linear horror storyline with different, unique events that change the experience, making even mundane cleaning tasks suspenseful.

CREDISTS
Used models:
Male Character PS1-Style (vinrax)
Old Radio (Red Fox / nokillnando)

Used music:
Sewerslvt - Cyberia lyr2
